description:
Ocoho and Melie are blamed for disobeying orders in the previous battle, but Mordred saves them by telling the queen that it was all Lord Brangoire`s mistake. Seth, meanwhile, remains in Caillte`s forest, training so that he can learn to control his power. With the help of Myr and Jill, he learns how to harmonize with Fantasia, but when he tries to control the darkness inside him...
Source: crunchyroll
